${ModID}:SneckoBartenderCutscene.NAME: Snecko Bartender Cutscene
BLOCKING_TEXTS: "You must be Confused, I have nothing left to offer you."
DESCRIPTIONS: "Greetings! Would you like to try some snacks?"
"All food served here are made by my sister Gake, with love, using our family recipes!"
"This Salad is made using my mums recipe, the secret ingredient is small mies."
"My dads Gummy Candy, great choice! He used to mix in some flice for extra protein you know."
OPTIONS: [Snake Salad] Heal #b%s-%s HP and Snecko increases the cost of a card.
[Snake Salad] Requires: Card with cost less than 3.
[Gecko Gummy] Lose #b%s-%s Gold and Snecko decreases the cost of a card.
[Gecko Gummy] Requires: #b%s Gold and card with cost more than 1.
